title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Lifelong Learning Path Design in Science Fields: Online LMS-Based Module

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific terminology understanding and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners autonomously explore five core science modules (Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Earth Science, Experimental Methods) provided by the LMS system to establish a personalized learning plan.
Learners self-define and achieve module completion conditions (e.g., quiz scores above 80%) using IMS-LD-based conditional settings.
Learners adjust learning paths based on formative assessment results and complete in-depth studies in at least three fields within a six-month course.

Learners upload ≥3 monthly learning artifacts (assignments, projects, assessments) to a digital portfolio platform (e.g., Google Sites, Notion) and, upon course completion, submit a career goal plan based on the portfolio, achieving ≥80% suitability rating from an instructor
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
